item.title: US official says personnel from Navy ship inspected Venezuelan boat for drugs
item.description: The Navy inspected a Venezuelan fishing boat, a U.S. official said, angering South American officials.

item.title: Details of Charlie Kirk's memorial announced
item.description: Just days after a gunman shot and killed Charlie Kirk at a Utah university, his wife, Erika, delivered her first public remarks on Friday night.

item.title: WATCH: Zoo throws birthday party for giant panda
item.description: The Smithsonian Zoo threw an adorable fourth birthday party for giant panda Qing Bao.

item.title: Taliban claim agreement reached with US envoys on a prisoner swap
item.description: It's part of an effort to normalize relations with the United States.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
